note.p: Burial: The chancel of Rostherne church, Cheshire
Education: Brasenose College, Oxford (matriculated 1697); Aberdeen. DMed (1720)
Career: Practised in Wisbech, Isle of Ely (1706-1720), and Stepney, Middlesex (from 1720); retired to Rostherne; one of the Keepers of the Ashmolean Museum; a Nonjuror
Memberships: FSA (1718); Extra-Licentiate RCP (1706); Hon FRCP (1726)
Notes: Proposed by Sir Hans Sloane. Foster gives age on matriculation as 15, age at death as 65
